metrics module

metrics.F1(pre, rec)[source]

calculate F1 score

Paramètres:

  • pre – precision

  • rec – recall

Renvoie:

F1 score

Type renvoyé:

float

metrics.auc(ground_truth, prediction)[source]

calculate AUC score

Paramètres:

  • ground_truth – ground truth

  • prediction – prediction

Renvoie:

AUC score

Type renvoyé:

float

metrics.average_precision(r, cut)[source]

calculate average precision

Paramètres:

  • r – list of relevance scores (either 1 or 0)

  • cut – number of results to consider

Renvoie:

average precision

Type renvoyé:

float

metrics.dcg_at_k(r, k, method=1)[source]

calculate discounted cumulative gain at k

Paramètres:

  • r – list of relevance scores (either 1 or 0)

  • k – number of results to consider

  • method – method to calculate dcg

Renvoie:

discounted cumulative gain at k

Type renvoyé:

float

metrics.hit_at_k(r, k)[source]

calculate hit at k

Paramètres:

  • r – list of relevance scores (either 1 or 0)

  • k – number of results to consider

Renvoie:

hit at k

Type renvoyé:

float

metrics.mean_average_precision(rs)[source]

calculate mean average precision

Paramètres:

rs – list of relevance scores (either 1 or 0)

Renvoie:

mean average precision

Type renvoyé:

float

metrics.ndcg_at_k(r, k, method=1)[source]

calculate normalized discounted cumulative gain at k

Paramètres:

  • r – list of relevance scores (either 1 or 0)

  • k – number of results to consider

  • method – method to calculate dcg

Renvoie:

normalized discounted cumulative gain at k

Type renvoyé:

float

metrics.precision_at_k(r, k)[source]

calculate precision at k

Paramètres:

  • r – list of relevance scores (either 1 or 0)

  • k – number of results to consider

Renvoie:

precision at k

Type renvoyé:

float

metrics.recall(rank, ground_truth, N)[source]
metrics.recall_at_k(r, k, all_pos_num)[source]

calculate recall at k

Paramètres:

  • r – list of relevance scores (either 1 or 0)

  • k – number of results to consider

  • all_pos_num – number of all positive samples

Renvoie:

recall at k

Type renvoyé:

float
